title: Throw out your scanner for Spring Cleaning and use your phone instead with this app
content:
Macworld

Back in the day, we used to have individual appliances and electronic devices for everything. A toaster oven was just a toaster oven. A scanner was only used for scanning documents. But now? It’s the 21st century! Everything is multi-functional, and thank god for that. An air fryer can now replace between 4-5 other appliances taking up valuable real estate in your cabinets and the iScanner App can replace your bulky dinosaur of a document scanner. With code SCAN, you can get iScanner at its lowest price ever — just $24.99.

Let’s be real, it’s 2025. It’s very rare to need to scan a document, but when you do need it, it’s going to be important and time sensitive. Is that once-a-year occasion really worth giving up valuable desk space in your too-small apartment? I don’t think so, but since FedEx is closing stores like crazy, you’re SOL if you need to scan something. Enter iScanner: an all-in-one document scanner. Get lifetime access to valuable AI tools like language recognition for 20+ languages, border adjustment, and the ability to edit PDFs like a pro! Scan documents, IDs or passports, and even QR codes from your phone.
